title: ONE BEDROOM APARTMENT HOME
posting_body: 1 Bedroom Affordale Housing for Seniors and Disabled
St. Clements Manor provides affordable apartments for seniors 62+ and the physically/mobility impaired.
We offer a professionally managed community with handicap accessible apartment homes.
Heat, water, trash pick-up, and snow removal are all included in your monthly rent.
You'll find our community to be a friendly welcoming place to call home.
